modName: Skyrim Refurbished - A Skyrim Content Overhaul
summary: Basically Skyrim Refurbished aims to add to and improve Skyrims vanilla world. In the mods current state it adds trees, npcs, items and objects to Whiterun, Riften, Markarth, Windhelm and Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
============================================================================================
TABLE OF CONTENTS: 
1. Description 
2. NPCs 
3. Flora 
4. Objects 
5. Battlefields 
6. Important Note 
7. Installation 
8. Uninstalling 
9. Updating 
10. compatibility
11. changelog  
============================================================================================
1. 
Skyrim Refurbished is aimed at overhauling the games vanilla world. This includes adding 10-15 new fallout style random NPCs to all the main cities in Skyrim. 
============================================================================================
2. NPCS: 
Like in Fallout, these NPCs are simply name 
\"(insertcitynamehere) Citizen\" they follow schedules that involve: browsing at the local market, wandering the city, and eating at the local inn. It also adds other NPCs like vigilants of stendarr that travel between cities and bands of adventures searching for treasure.   
============================================================================================
3. FLORA: 
Skyrim Refurbished also adds many plants to cities that have the space for them. These cities manly  
include Whiterun and Solitude. I have done my best to not go crazy with the flora in order to conserve frame rates. 
============================================================================================
4. OBJECTS: 
This mod also adds many objects to the world as well. This includes barrels, crates, furniture, containers, blacksmiths, balistas and so and so on. I have done my best to tweak the navmesh to suit these features but don\'t be surprised if you get any NPCs walking into crates or something. 
============================================================================================
5. BATTLEFIELDS: 
There are now random battles around Skyrim. In the current version there are not that many at all but you can expect some more soon.  
============================================================================================
6. IMPORTANT NOTE: 
This mod is still very much in development. All the major cities now have added random NPCs and objects. However there are still man more updates to come. (see change log) 
============================================================================================
7. INSTALLATION: 
To install simply extract the downloaded folder into your Skyrim data folder. Easy. 
============================================================================================
8. UNINSTALLING: 
To Uninstall, uncheck \"Skyrim Refurbished\" in Skyrim Launcher/Data Files then delete from your data folder. Again, easy. 
============================================================================================
9. UPDATING: 
Here is what I found the safest way to update.
1. Save your game and exit.
2. Uncheck \"Skyrim Refurbished\". 
3. Run your game again and hit continue (ignore warnings) then save and exit again.
4. Delete old file and replace with old one.  
============================================================================================
10. COMPATIBILITY: 
Any mod that drastically changes cities is most likely in-compatible with Skyrim Refurbished. I have not tested with open cities or crowded cities but they are most likely incompatible as well. 
============================================================================================    
11. CHANGELOG:
Version 2 20/05/13 
- Added NPCs to Windhelm and Markarth 
- Fix a vigilant of stendaar not doing any thing 
- In Markarth, thugs roam the docks at night 
- Added battlefields outside Markarth and Whiterun 
- Fixed some idle markers 
- Added a blacksmith apprentice to Riften and Solitude 
- A familiar character from oblivion can now be found behind the Bannered Mere 

Version 3 22/05/13
The list of things I added would be to long to put in here so here are the major changes. 
- Added more NPC presets for random generation 
- Fixed the random NPC\'s voices
- added many more barrels, crates, etc around the world 
- added a few more battlefields (mainly around solitude) 
Don\'t forget to update properly and endorse!   
============================================================================================
COMING SOON: 
Adding more warzones 
Adding more NPCs (adventures, thugs etc) 
Improving remote villages 
Adding new remote villages 
Possibly adding a new faction  
============================================================================================
If you have ANY suggestions for the mod please share, also please report any bugs. Finally don\'t forget to share and endorse as it encourages me to update!   

Hope you enjoy the mod.  
============================================================================================
PS: Anyone who is willing to help out with some scripting please message me.
author: Iconic985
